parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math - Geometry

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a 2D distance ([[distance]] projected to X,Y plane) in meters between two [[Object]]s or two [[Position]]s or [[Object]] and [[Position]].
<br><br>
[[Image:distance2D.jpg|400px]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> param1 '''distance2D''' param2

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> param1: [[Object]], [[Position2D]] or [[Position3D]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> param2: [[Object]], [[Position2D]] or [[Position3D]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] -  Distance in meters or 1e10 if distance cannot be calculated
  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_meters = [[player]] [[distance2D]] heli;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[distance]], [[distanceSqr]], [[vectorDistance]]
</value></part></template>




<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
